Title: Quotation from Chairman Mao: All the people of the world must unite...
Notes: The full quotation reads "The people of the whole world should unite to oppose any war of aggression launched by imperialism and social-imperialism, especially those that use nuclear weapons. If such a war occurs, the people of the whole world should eliminate the war of aggression through revolutionary war, from now on be fully prepared!" (全世界人民团结起来，反对任何帝国主义，社会帝国主义发动的侵略战争，特别要反对以原子能为武器的侵略战争，如果这种战争发生，全世界人民就应该以革命战争消灭侵略战争，从现代起就要所准备！)
